alert.note: Alert for Pecos; Terrell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 7:28PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pecos and northeastern Terrell Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 728 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 24 miles west of Sheffield, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sheffield. This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 310 and 327. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Texas.
